issue.title: [Rust] Build buffers from iterator of booleans
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11361](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11361). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Simplify the creation of bit buffers in the comparison kernel by introducing a standard Iterator<Item=bool> -> Buffer function.

Most null-buffer logic can rely on byte-level boolean operations, so it may not have much utility outside of the comparison kernel?
